SELECT * FROM( SELECT SRG.RGROUP_ID AS GROUP_ID, SRG.RGROUP_NAME AS GROUP_NAME, 'FUNC' AS ROLE_TYPE, SFR.FUNC_ROLE_ID AS ROLE_ID, SFR.FUNC_ROLE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME FROM SET_ROLE_GROUP SRG INNER JOIN SET_RGROUP_FROLE SRF ON SRG.RGROUP_ID = SRF.RGROUP_ID INNER JOIN SET_FUNC_ROLE SFR ON SFR.FUNC_ROLE_ID = SRF.FUNC_ROLE_ID UNION ALL SELECT SRG.RGROUP_ID AS GROUP_ID, SRG.RGROUP_NAME AS GROUP_NAME, 'RESOURCE' AS ROLE_TYPE, SRR2.RESOURCE_ROLE_ID AS ROLE_ID, SRR2.RESOURCE_ROLE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME FROM SET_ROLE_GROUP SRG INNER JOIN SET_RGROUP_RROLE SRR ON SRG.RGROUP_ID = SRR.RGROUP_ID INNER JOIN SET_RESOURCE_ROLE SRR2 ON SRR2.RESOURCE_ROLE_ID = SRR.RESOURCE_ROLE_ID ) WRAP
AND GROUP_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{params.groupName},'%')
